name: Adran Blake
content:
Adran Blake was a male Human, who lived during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.
Blake worked as a cook in the Space Monkey Caf√©, a bar that was located in the platform city of Bayonard, on the planet of Cularin. He assisted the bar's manager, Chelsey Grimes, in his duties. He was also known to be quite grumpy.
